notesStmt.note: Inscribed in the verso in large square letters: לסעדיה הלוי\ בן הלל הלוי\ האלהים יזכהו לקרא בו ושלום; on recto after owner's inscription, a second column (more frame format than marginalia?); marginalia (?) and ornamentation in upper margin of recto; verso is vocalized.
Condition: nearly complete; orn. dev.; stained; marginalia.
